href="http://Mike PenceMike Pence.house.gov/"> Republican U.S. Mike Pence made the rounds at the Indiana Statehouse on Tuesday. office, delivered a speech in both the Indiana House and Senate chambers, and then spoke with news media. I would say our options we're considering and we're reflecting on are to either continue to serve in Washington in some capacity, to come home to Indiana to seek higher office or to seek higher office on the national level, Mike Pence told reporters. Indiana Republicans have said in recent weeks that they believe Mike Pence will run for governor, in part because the office could serve as a better springboard for a national campaign than a U.S.

had raised fears that the country could suffer the same loss of cultural heritage as occurred in Iraq in 2003 after the fall of Saddam Hussein. Egypt's cultural treasures are now secure, Zahi Hawass said. The Valley of the Kings is safe, the pyramids are safe, 24 museums are safe, the synagogues and the monasteries and the Muslim monuments are completely safe, he said.
